模块 org.redkale
程序包 org.redkale.net.http

类 HttpFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.redkale.net.Filter<HttpContext,​HttpRequest,​HttpResponse>
      • org.redkale.net.http.HttpFilter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Comparable
    直接已知子类:
    WatchFilter
    public abstract class HttpFilter
extends Filter<HttpContext,​HttpRequest,​HttpResponse>
    HTTP 过滤器
    可通过Priority进行顺序设置

    详情见: https://redkale.org

    作者:
    zhangjx
    另请参阅:
    Priority
